cards.title: Purpose
cards.text: We want to make the difference, we want to save lives and our target is to donate an initial amount of 1 dollar per sold Panda.

cards.title: Our Story
cards.text: So back in 2015 it appeared on the news that an animal shelter was on fire and that they had no money to find a new place for the 500+ animals (dogs and cats) they took care of.

cards.title: Our Team
cards.text: Our team is composed by four members, all friends since elementary school and now we are currently attending University.
